data.author: Bloomberg
data.title: India’s biggest borrowing plan pushes bond yields to one-year high
data.description: India's record borrowing plan drives bond yields to a one-year high, raising concerns over economic strain and interest rates.
data.content:
Indias benchmark bond yields climbed to the highest in more than a year after the government unveiled a record debt-sale plan that exceeded analysts expectations.

data.title: Gold and silver keep spiraling after market meltdown
data.description: Before Friday's selloff, gold and silver had been on a blistering yearlong rally, fueled by heavy central bank buying and geopolitical tensions.
data.content:
Precious metals extended their losses in Asian trading on Monday after a brutal sell-off late last week.

data.title: Trump’s plan to make housing affordable is faltering
data.description: “We’re not going to destroy the value of their homes so somebody who didn’t work very hard can buy a home,” Trump said.

data.title: He spent years waiting for the right moment to move to Japan. Retirement led him to Thailand instead.
data.description: "I should spend more time at home, but there's so much to see and do and people to meet that I have a hard time staying home," Bill Strayer said.
data.content:
